segment.source: Choose how a default copyright date is selected for an article. This default can be overridden on a case-by-case basis. If you "publish as you go", don't use the issue's publication date.
OJS will not be used to publish the journal's contents online.
The journal will provide open access to its contents.
The journal will require subscriptions to access some or all of its contents.
The publishing details have been updated.
Are you sure you want to reset all email templates in this journal? You will lose any customizations you have made.
segment.target: Ste prepričani, da želite ponastaviti vse e-poštne predloge te revije? S tem boste izgubili vse prilagoditve, ki ste jih naredili.

segment.source: Note: The Files Browser is an advanced feature that allows the files and directories associated with a journal to be viewed and manipulated directly.
segment.target: Opomba: Brskalnik datotek je napredna funkcionalnost, ki omogoča, da se lahko datoteke in mape povezane s revijo neposredno pregledujejo in urejajo.

segment.source: This will replace any locale-specific journal settings you had for this locale
segment.target: To bo nadomestilo vse jezikovno specifične nastavitve revije, ki ste jih naredili za ta jezik

segment.source:
OJS can be made available to users in any of several supported languages. As well, OJS can operate as a multilingual system, providing users with an ability to toggle between languages on each page, and allowing certain data to be entered in several additional languages.

If a language supported by OJS is not listed below, ask your site administrator to install the language from the site administration interface. For instructions on adding support for new languages, please consult the OJS documentation.
segment.target:
Sistem OJS podpira več jezikov. Enako OJS lahko deluje večjezično, kar pomeni, da lahko uporabniki preklapljajo med različnimi jeziki na vsaki spletni strani OJSja in omogoča, da se določeni podatki vpišejo v večih jezikih.

Če jezik, ki ga OJS podpira, ni naštet spodaj, potem prosite administratorja spletišča, da ga naloži s pomočjo administratorskega vmesnika. Za navodila o dodajanju novih jezikov, si oglejte dokumentacijo OJS.

segment.source: Sorry, no additional languages are available. Contact your site administrator if you wish to use additional languages with this journal.
segment.target: Oprostite, na voljo ni nobenega dodatnega jezika. Prosite administratorja spletišča, če bi želeli uporabljati dodatne jezike.

segment.source: This will be the default language for the journal site.
segment.target: Ta jezik bo privzet za celotno spletišče.

segment.source: Enter fee amounts below in order to enable author processing charges.
segment.target: Izbrane možnosti, skupaj z opisi in pristojbinami (ki jih lahko urejate spodaj), se bodo prikazale v prvem koraku procesa oddaje prispevka in v meniju O reviji, pod Oddani prispevki, enako kot na straneh, kjer je potrebno plačilo.

segment.source: OJS does not perform any currency conversions. If accepting payments for subscriptions, you must ensure that the subscription currency matches the one specified here.
segment.target: OJS ne dela nobenih valutnih pretvorb. Če želite sprejemati plačila v določeni valuti, morate sami vpisati pravilno vrednost naročnine v valuti.

segment.source: All costs must be positive numeric values (decimal points are allowed)
segment.target: Vsi zneski morajo biti pozitivna števila (decimalke so dovoljene)

segment.source: The Association Membership will appear in About the Journal under Policies, and the donations link will appear above the search function in the right-hand frame.
segment.target: Možnost članstva bo objavljena na strani O reviji pod Politike. V slučaju aktivacije opcije, se bo donatorska povezava pokazala nad funkcijo iskanja na desni strani okvirja.

segment.source: This will activate payments for Subscriptions, where types, cost, duration and subscriptions are managed by the Journal (Subscription) Manager.
segment.target: To bo aktiviralo modul za plačilo naročnin, kjer bodo uredniki revij lahko urejali tipe naročnin, pristojbine in trajanje naročnin.

segment.source: Are you sure you wish to delete this subscription?
segment.target: Ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti to naročnino?

segment.source: The payment settings have been updated.
Payments will be enabled for this journal. Note that users will be required to log in to make payments.
segment.target: Kliknite za vključitev plačilnega modula. Nastavitve za plačevanje morate nastaviti v obrazcu spodaj.

segment.source: Only Restrict Access to PDF version of issues and articles
segment.target: Omejen dostop do PDF verzij številk in prispevkov

segment.source: You may configure any of the following Payment Method Plugins from this screen.
segment.target: Na tej strani lahko nastavite dodatke za naslednje metode plačil.

segment.source: Selected options, along with their descriptions and fees (which can be edited below), will appear in About the Journal under Policies, as well as at points where payment is required.
segment.target: Izbrane opcije (ki se lahko urejajo spodaj) bodo prikazane na strani O reviji pod politikami in na točkah, kjer bo potrebno plačilo

segment.source: Enroll a User from this Site in this Journal
segment.target: Registriraj obstoječega uporabnika za to revijo

segment.source: Remove this user from this journal? This action will unenroll the user from all roles within this journal.
segment.target: Odstrani uporabnika iz te revije? Ta akcija bo uporabniku zbrisala tudi vse vloge, ki jih ima pri tej reviji.

segment.source: Select a user (or several) to merge into another user account (e.g., when someone has two user accounts). The account(s) selected first will be deleted and any submissions, assignments, etc. will be attributed to the second account.
segment.target: Izberite račun uporabnika (ali več), ki jih želite zružiti v drug uporabniški račun (npr. če kdo uporablja več uporabniških računov). Vsi oddani prispevki, zadolžitve in ostalo, prvoizbranega uporabniškega računa (ali več njih) bodo zbrisani in preneseni na drug uporabniški račun.

segment.source: Select a user to whom to attribute the previous users' authorships, editing assignments, etc.
segment.target: Izberite uporabnika, ki mu želite pripisati vsa avtorska dela, uredniške zadolžitve, itd. prejšnjega uporabnika.

segment.source: Enrollment synchronization will enroll all users enrolled in the specified role in the specified journal into the same role in this journal. This function allows a common set of users (e.g., Reviewers) to be synchronized between journals.
segment.target: Ta funkcija se lahko uporablja le, če je na spletišču več revij. Sinhronizacija dodeljene vloge bo vsem uporabnikom, ki imajo dodeljeno vlogo v izbrani reviji dodelila enako vlogo v tej reviji. Ta možnost se uporablja pri sinhroniziranju običajnih skupin uporabnikov (npr. recenzentov) med revijami, ki se nahajajo na istem spletišču.

segment.source: There are no section editors yet. Add this role to at least one user via Management > Settings > Users & Roles first.
segment.target: Ne obstaja noben urednik rubrike. Najprej dodajte to vlogo vsaj enemu uporabniku preko Upravljanje > Nastavitve > Uporabniki & vloge.

segment.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this section?
segment.target: Ste prepričani, da želite trajno zbrisati to rubriko?

segment.source: Before this section can be deleted, you must move articles published within it into other sections.
segment.target: Pred brisanjem rubrike, morate objavljene prispevke iz te rubrike premakniti v drugo rubriko.

segment.source: Add a Section Editor to this section to have submissions automatically assigned to the Section Editor. (Otherwise, Section Editors can be assigned manually, after a submission comes in.) If added, a Section Editor can be automatically assigned to oversee the REVIEW (peer review) and/or the EDITING (copyediting, layout and proofreading) of submissions to this section. Section Editors are created by clicking Section Editors under Roles in Journal Management.
segment.target: Dodaj urednika rubrike, ki mu bodo avtomatsko dodeljeni vsi oddani prispevki za to rubriko. (Drugače se lahko dodeli urednika za vsak prispevek posebej, ko je oddan.) Če je urednik rubrike dodan, bo avtomatsko dodeljen za nadzorovanje procesa recenzije in/ali urejanja (lektoriranje, grafično oblikovanje in korektura) prispevkov za to rubriko. Urednike rubrik ustvari te s klikom na Uredniki rubrik pod Vlogami v Upravljanju revije.

segment.source: Items can only be submitted by Editors and Section Editors.
segment.target: Samo uredniki (rubrik) lahko oddajajo prispevke za to rubriko

segment.source: An abbreviated title is required for the section
segment.target: Za rubriko je potreben skrajšan naslov

segment.source: Please ensure that at least one checkbox is checked for each Section Editor assignment.
segment.target: Preverite, da je za vsako vlogo urednika rubrike izbrano vsaj eno potrditveno polje.

segment.source: Please ensure that you have chosen a valid review form.
segment.target: Preverite, da ste izbrali veljaven recenzijski obrazec.

segment.source: A title is required for the section.
Omit author names for section items from issues' table of contents.
segment.target: Izpusti ime avtorjev za rubriko v kazalu vsebine te številke.

segment.source: Omit the title of this section from issues' table of contents.
segment.target: Izpusti naslov te rubriko v kazalu vsebine te številke.

segment.source: Identify items published in this section as a(n)
segment.target: Pri kreiranju metapodatkov, bodo vsi prispevki v tej rubriki označeni kot:

segment.source: (For example, "Peer-reviewed Article", "Non-refereed Book Review", "Invited Commentary", etc.)
Will not be included in the indexing of the journal
segment.target: Ne bo vključeno v indeksiranje revije

segment.source: Submissions made to this section of the journal
segment.target: Prispevki oddani v to rubriko revije
Uredniki rubrik, ki so na voljo

segment.source: Limit abstract word counts for this section (0 for no limit)
segment.target: Omeji število besed v izvlečku v tej rubriki na (0 za neomejeno):

segment.source: The journal homepage consists of navigation links by default. Additional homepage content can be appended by using one or all of the following options, which will appear in the order shown.
segment.target: Domača stran revije privzeto vsebuje navigacijske povezave. Dodatne vsebine domače strani lahko dodate s pomočjo ene ali več spodnjih močnosti, ki se bodo prikazale v prikazanem vrstnem redu.

segment.source: Add Item to Appear in "About the Journal"

segment.target: Dodaj novo povezavo do baze podatkov

segment.source: Alternately, instead of title and logo, an HTML version of the header can be inserted into the text box below. Leave textbox blank if not required.
segment.target: Namesto naslova in logotipa lahko vstavite HTML besedilo glave v polje z besedilom spodaj. Če tega ne želite, pustite polje prazno.

segment.source: The announcements settings have been updated.
Enter any information you would like to appear on your announcements page.
The archiving details for this journal have been updated.
Require submitting Authors to file a Competing Interest (CI) statement with their submission.
segment.target: Zahtevaj od avtorjev izjavo o konfliktu interesov med procesom oddaje prispevka.

segment.source: Require Reviewers to file a CI statement with each peer review they submit.
segment.target: Zahtevaj od recenzentov izjavo o konfliktu interesov pri vsaki opravljeni recenziji.

segment.source: This text will appear in the "About" section of the journal website and can be used to describe changes in titles, editorial board, and other items of relevance to the journal's publication history.
segment.target: To besedilo bo na strani O reviji in ga lahko uporabite, da napišete spremembe naslovov, uredniškega odbora in ostalih stvari, ki so pomembne za zgodovino revije

segment.source: The contact details for this journal have been updated.
Name of journal, ISSN, contacts, sponsors, and search engines.
segment.target: Ime revije, ISSN, kotaktni podatki, sponzorji in iskalniki.

segment.source: The Journal Manager will register all user accounts. Editors or Section Editors may register user accounts for reviewers.
segment.target: Glavni urednik revije registrira vse uporabnike, s tem da lahko uredniki sami registrirajo recenzente.

segment.source: Useful when journal crosses disciplinary boundaries and/or authors submit multidisciplinary items.
segment.target: Uporabno kadar revija prečka meje ene vede in/ali je avtorski prispevek multidisciplinaren

segment.source: (E.g., History; Education; Sociology; Psychology; Cultural Studies; Law)
segment.target: (npr. zgodovina; izobraževanje; sociologija; psihologija; kulturne študije; pravo; itd.)

segment.source: Provide examples of relevant academic disciplines for this journal
segment.target: Navedite primere relevantnih akademskih ved za to revijo

segment.source: Add the table of contents for the current issue (if available).
segment.target: Dodaj kazalo vsebine za trenutno številko (če je na voljo).
Naslov za obvestilo o neuspeli dostavi

segment.source: Any undeliverable emails will result in an error message to this address.

In order to send undeliverable emails to a bounce address, the site administrator must enable the allow_envelope_sender option in the site configuration file. Server configuration may be required, as indicated in the OJS documentation.
The prepared emails that are sent by the system on behalf of the journal will have the following signature added to the end.
Announcements may be published to inform readers of journal news and events. Published announcements will appear on the Announcements page.
How many announcements to display on the homepage. Leave this empty to display none.
Visitors can register a user account with the journal.
segment.target: Uporabniki se lahko sami registrirajo za eno ali več spodnjih vlog pri reviji:

segment.source: Describe to authors, readers, and librarians the range of articles and other items the journal will publish.
segment.target: Razložite avtorjem, bralcem in knjižničarjem obseg prispevdkov in ostale stvari, ki jih bo revija izdajala.

segment.source: For Authors to Index Their Work

OJS adheres to the Open Archives Initiative Protocol for Metadata Harvesting, which is the emerging standard for providing well-indexed access to electronic research resources on a global scale. The authors will use a similar template to provide metadata for their submission. The Journal Manager should select the categories for indexing and present authors with relevant examples to assist them in indexing their work.
segment.target: OJS se naslanja na Open Archives Initiative protokol za zbiranje metapodatkov, ki je standard v nastajanju za dobro indeksiran dostop do elektronskih raziskovalnih virov na globalni ravni. Avtorji bodo uporabljali podobne predloge za določanje metapodatkov svojih prispevkov. Upravnik revije mora izbrati kategorije za indeksiranje in predstaviti avtorjem relevantne primere, ki jim bodo pomagali pri indeksiranju njihovih prispevkov.

segment.source: The specified ISSN is not valid.
segment.target: The specified ISSN is not valid.

segment.source: The primary contact email is required.
The primary contact name is required.
The number of reviewers per submission is required.
segment.target: Število recenzentov na oddan prispevek je obvezno.

segment.source: For journals that offer immediate or delayed open access, include a Creative Commons license with all published work at the appropriate time.
segment.target: Za revije, ki nudijo prost dostop ali prost dostop z zamikom, v primernem času vključite tudi "Creative Commons" licenco za vse izdane prispevke.

segment.source: Brief descriptions of the journal for librarians and prospective authors and readers. These are made available in the site's sidebar when the Information block has been added.
segment.target: Kratek opis revije za knjižničarje ter bodoče avtorje in bralce je na voljo pod razdelkom Informacije na stranskem robnem stolpcu.

segment.source: The information for this journal was updated.
Depending on the format selected, identify the issue, volume, and/or year of the first issue to be published with OJS:
segment.target: Glede na izbrani format določite številko, letnik in leto prve izdaje, ki bo objavljena preko OJS:

segment.source: Navigation bar items can be added to the current set (Home, About, User Home, etc.) that appear at the top of the page.
segment.target: Na navigacijski trak se lahko poleg obstoječih povezav (Domača stran, O reviji, Dom uporabnika,itd) dodajo tudi druge povezave, ki se pojavljajo na vrhu vsake strani.

segment.source: Limit the number of items (for example, submissions, users, or editing assignments) to show in a list before showing subsequent items in another page.

Include any information about your journal which may be of interest to readers, authors or reviewers. This could include your open access policy, the focus and scope of the journal, copyright notice, sponsorship disclosure, history of the journal, a privacy statement, and inclusion in any LOCKSS or CLOCKSS archival system.
segment.target: Vključite vse informacije o reviji, ki so lahko zanimive za bralce, avtorje in recenzente. To lahko vključuje politiko prostega dostopa, fokus in obseg revije, izjava o avtorskih pravicah, politiko sponzorstva, zgodovino revije, izjavo o vrovanju osebnih podatkov in vključitev v LOCKSS ali CLOCKSS sistem arhiviranja.

segment.source: By default, the homepage consists of navigation links. Additional homepage content can be appended by using one or all of the following options, which will appear in the order shown. Note that the current issue is always accessible through the Current link in the navigation bar.
segment.target: Privzeto domača stran revije vsebuje navigacijske povezave. Poleg tega lahko domača stran revije vsebuje tudi eno ali več spodnjih opcij, ki se bodo pojavile v spodnjem vrstnem redu. Trenutna številka revije je vendo dostopna preko povezave Trenutna številka v navigacijskem traku.

segment.source: A graphic version of the journal's title and logo (as a .gif, .jpg, or .png file) can be uploaded for the homepage, which will replace the text version that otherwise appears.
segment.target: Naložite lahko grafično verzijo naslova in logotipa revije (kot .gif, .jpg ali .png datoteka), ki bo zamenjala besedilno verzijo, ki se drugače pojavlja.

segment.source: Choose a journal theme and select layout components here. A journal stylesheet may also be uploaded, which can be used to override style data in the system-wide stylesheets and theme stylesheet (if a theme is chosen).
segment.target: Izberite stilsko temo in razpored elementov naslovnice revije. Hkrati lahko postavite tudi stilsko tablico revije, ki bo zamenjala sistemsko določeno stilsko tablico ali tematsko stilsko tablico (če je določena).

segment.source: This is the footer of your journal. To change or update the footer, paste the HTML code in the textbox below. Examples could be another navigation bar, a counter, etc. This footer will appear on every page.
segment.target: To je noga strani revije. Za spreminjanje vnesite HTML besedilo v besedilno polje spodaj. Primeri so lahko drug navigacijski trak, števec in podobno. Ta noga bo na vsaki strani revije.

segment.source: Your journal setup has been updated.
segment.target: Namestitev vaše revije je bila posodobljena.

segment.source: Invalid journal stylesheet format. Accepted format is .css.
segment.target: Napačen format stilske tablice. Dovoljen format je .css.

segment.source: A small logo or representation of the journal that can be used in lists of journals.
segment.target: Mahen logo oziroma grafična predstavitev revije, ki se bo uporabila na seznamu revij na tem spletišču.

segment.source: Provide a short description of your journal and identify editors, managing directors and other members of your editorial team.
The list settings for this journal have been updated.
The PKP Preservation Network (PN) provides free preservation services for any OJS journal that meets a few basic criteria.
segment.target: PKP Preservation Network (PN) brezplačno zagotavlja servis za ohranjanje za vse OJS revije, ki zadostujejo nekaj osnovnih kriterijev.

segment.source: View the <button>plugin settings</button> to accept the terms of use for the PKP PN.
segment.target: Kliknite na povezavo za sprejem pogojev uporabe za PKP PN.

segment.source: The PKP Preservation Network (PN) provides free preservation services for any OJS journal that meets a few basic criteria. The PKP PN plugin for OJS 3 is currently in development and will be available in the plugin gallery soon.
segment.target: PKP Preservation Network (PN) brezplačno zagotavlja servis za ohranjanje za vse OJS revije, ki zadostujejo nekaj osnovnih kriterijev. PKP PN vtičnik za OJS 3 je trenutno v razvoju in bo kmalu na voljo v katalogu vtičnikov.

segment.source: Enable LOCKSS to store and distribute journal content at participating libraries via a LOCKSS Publisher Manifest page.
segment.target: Omogočite sistemu LOCKSS, da shranjuje in distribuira vsebino revije po knjižnicah, ki sodelujejo v LOCKSS sistemu. Več o LOCKSS na Publisher Manifest strani.

segment.source: A LOCKSS license will appear in About the Journal under Archiving: LOCKSS License
segment.target: LOCKSS licenca se bo pojavila na strani O reviji pod Arhiviranje: LOCKSS License

segment.source: Identify 6-10 libraries that will register and cache the journal. For example, turn to institutions where editors or Board members work and/or institutions already participating in LOCKSS. See the LOCKSS community.
segment.target: Identificirajte 6-10 knjižnic, ki se bodo registrirale in shranjevale revijo. Na primer institucije kjer delujejo uredniki ali člani uredništva in/ali institucije, ki že sodelujejo v LOCKSS-u. Poglejte LOCKSS skupnost.

segment.source: Enable CLOCKSS to store and distribute journal content at participating libraries via a CLOCKSS Publisher Manifest page.
segment.target: Omogočite sistemu CLOCKSS, da shranjuje in distribuira vsebino revije po knjižnicah, ki sodelujejo v CLOCKSS sistemu. Več o na Publisher Manifest strani.

segment.source: A CLOCKSS license will appear in About the Journal under Archiving: CLOCKSS License
segment.target: A CLOCKSS cenca se bo pojavila na strani O reviji pod Arhiviranje: CLOCKSS licenca

segment.source: Sign up for the CLOCKSS service by visiting the CLOCKSS website.
segment.target: Prijavite se za storitev CLOCKSS na CLOCKSS spletni strani.

segment.source: Homepage header, content, journal header, footer, navigation bar, and style sheet.
segment.target: Glava domače strani, vsebina, glava revije, noga, navigacijski trak in stilska tablica

segment.source: Access and security, scheduling, announcements, copyediting, layout, and proofreading.
segment.target: Dostopnost in varnost, urnik objavljanja revije, objavljanje obvestil, postavke lekture, korekture in preloma.

segment.source: The masthead details for this journal have been updated.
Add or remove additional navigation bar items.
segment.target: Dodaj ali odstrani postavke na navigacijskem traku.

segment.source: URL is an absolute URL (e.g., "http://www.example.com") rather than a path relative to the site (e.g., "/manager/setup")
segment.target: URL je absoluten naslov (npr. "http://www.example.com") in ne relativen na spletišče (npr. "/manager/setup")

segment.source: The label value is a literal string (e.g., "Journal Setup") rather than a localization message key (e.g., "manager.setup")
segment.target: Naziv povezave naj bo opisno besedilo (npr. "Registracija uporabnika") in ne ključ iz lokalizacijskega kataloga (npr. "manager.setup")

segment.source: Note: The submission acknowledgement email is currently disabled. To use this feature, enable the "Submission Ack" email in Emails.
segment.target: Opozorilo: E-pošta za potrditev uspešne oddaje prispevka je trenutno izključen. Za uporabo te funkcije vključite opcijo SUBMISSION_ACK e-pošta nastavitvah Emaili.

segment.source: Limit the number of links to display to subsequent pages in a list.
Focus, peer review, sections, privacy, security, and additional about items.
segment.target: Fokus, recenzija, rubrike, zasebnost, varnost in ostale informacije o reviji.

segment.source: The privacy statement has been updated.

The Proofreading Instructions will be made available to Proofreaders, Authors, Layout Editors, and Section Editors in the Submission Editing stage. Below is a default set of instructions in HTML, which can be edited or replaced by the Journal Manager at any point (in HTML or plain text).
segment.target: Navodila za korekturo bodo videli korektorji, avtorji, grafični uredniki in uredniki rubrik v procesu urejanja prispevka. Spodaj so privzeta navodila v HTML formatu, ki jih lahko kadarkoli glavni urednik revije spremeni (HTML ali navadno besedilo).

segment.source: Journal items can be published collectively, as part of an issue with its own Table of Contents. Alternatively, individual items can be published as soon as they are ready, by adding them to the "current" volume's Table of Contents. Provide readers, in About the Journal, with a statement about the system this journal will use and its expected frequency of publication.
segment.target: Prispevki se običajno izdajajo skupaj v posamezni številki revije s kazalom vsebine. Alternativno se lahko posamezni prispevki objavijo takoj, ko so končani, tako da se dodajo v kazalo vsebine trenutne številke. Na strani O reviji predstavite bralcem princip objavljanja, ki ga bo revija uporabljala in pričakovano frekvenco izhajanja.

segment.source: These details may be included in metadata provided to third-party archival bodies.
Users must be registered and log in to view open access content.
segment.target: Uporabniki morajo biti registrirani in prijavljeni, da lahko vidijo prosto dostopno vsebino.

segment.source: Users must be registered and log in to view the journal site.
segment.target: Uporabniki morajo biti registrirani in prijavljeni, da lahko vidijo spletno stran revije.
Avtomatizirani e-poštni opomniki (na voljo v OJS privzetih e-poštah) se lahko pošljejo recenzentom v dveh primerih (urednik lahko sam vedno pošlje e-pošto recenzentu).

segment.source: To send automated email reminders, the site administrator must enable the <tt>scheduled_tasks</tt> option in the OJS configuration file. Additional server configuration may be required as indicated in the OJS documentation.
segment.target: Za aktivacijo teh opcij mora administrator spletišča aktivirati nastavitev <tt>scheduled_tasks</tt>v nastavitveni datoteki OJS. Morda bodo potrebne tudi dodatne nastavitve strežnika, da bo ta opcija podprta kot je opisano v OJS dokumentaciji.

segment.source: Weeks allowed to complete the review
Editors will rate reviewers on a five-point quality scale after each review.
segment.target: Po opravljeni posamezni recenziji bodo uredniki ocenjevali kvaliteto recenzije in sodelovanja z oceno od 1 do 5.
Recenzenti bodo imeli dostop do oddanega prispevka šele po tem, ko bodo sprejeli recenzijo tega prispevka.

segment.source: Reviewers will not be given access to the submission file until they have agreed to review it.

segment.target: Omogoči recenzentom dostop z enim klikom.

segment.source: Reviewers can be sent a secure link in the email invitation, which will allow them to access the review without logging in. Access to other pages requires them to log in.
segment.target: Opozorilo: E-poštna povabila recenzentom vsebujejo posebne URL povezave, ki vodijo recenzente direktno na stran za opravljanje recenzije prispevka (za dostop do drugih strani se morajo najprej prijaviti). Iz varnostnih razlogov uredniki ne morejo spreminjati e-poštnega naslova ali dodati kopijo ali skrito kopijo e-poštnega naslova pred pošiljanjem e-pošte recenzentom.

segment.source: Include a secure link in the email invitation to reviewers.
The search engine index settings have been updated.
Help search engines like Google discover and display your site. You are encouraged to submit your sitemap.
Provide a brief description (50-300 characters) of the journal which search engines can display when listing the journal in search results.
(If sections are not added, then items are submitted to the Articles section by default.)
segment.target: (Če rubrike niso definirane, bodo vsi prispevki dodeljeni splošni rubriki "prispevki".)

segment.source:
To create or modify sections for the journal (e.g., Articles, Book Reviews, etc.), go to Section Management.

Authors on submitting items to the journal will designate...
segment.target:
Za kreiranje ali spreminjanje rubrik revije (npr. Prispevki, Recenzije knjig,...) pojdite na Upravljanje rubrik.

Avtorji bodo ob oddaji prispevkov za revijo določili...

segment.source: The journal editor who will see it through the editorial process.
segment.target: Urednik revije, ki bo to videl skozi uredniški postopek.

segment.source: The journal section for which the item will be considered.
segment.target: rubrika revije, za katero bo prispevek predviden.

segment.source: Always show galley links and indicate restricted access.
segment.target: Vedno pokaži povezavo na celoten prispevek, z oznako omejenega pristopa.

segment.source: Five Steps to a Journal Web Site
segment.target: Pet korakov za postavitev spletne strani revije

segment.source: (E.g., Photosynthesis; Black Holes; Four-Color Map Problem; Bayesian Theory)
segment.target: (npr. fotosinteza; črne luknje; pokojninska reforma; Bayesova teorija)

segment.source: Provide examples of keywords or topics as a guide for authors
segment.target: V pomoč avtorjem podajte primere ključnih besed ali vsebin.

segment.source: On making a submission to the journal, authors are first asked to check each item on the Submission Preparation Checklist as completed, before proceeding. The checklist also appears in the Author Guidelines, under About the Journal. The list can be edited below, but all items on the list will require a checkmark before authors can proceed with their submission.
segment.target: Ob oddaji prispevka za revijo morajo avtorji najprej potrditi, da njihov prispevek zadovoljuje vsako postavko na kontrolnem seznamu za oddajo prispevka. Kontrolni seznam za oddajo prispevka je tudi na strani O reviji pod rubriko Navodila avtorjem. Kontrolni seznam lahko urejate spodaj, avtorji pa morajo vedno s kljukico označiti vsak postavko kot izpolnjeno, preden lahko oddajo prispevek.

segment.source: Author guidelines, copyright, and indexing (including registration).
segment.target: Navodila avtorjem, avtorske pravice in indeksiranje vsebine revije.

segment.source: Provide metadata to third-party indexing services through the Open Archives Initiative.
(E.g., Historical Inquiry; Quasi-Experimental; Literary Analysis; Survey/Interview)
segment.target: (npr. zgodovinsko raziskovanje; naravni eksperiment; književna analiza; ankete/intervju)

segment.source: Provide examples of relevant research types, methods, and approaches for this field
segment.target: Podajte primere ustreznih iskalnih tipov, metod in pristopov za to področje

segment.source: Articles and issues can be tagged with an identification number or string, employing a registration system such as the Digital Object Identifier System (DOI).
segment.target: Prispevki in številke revije so lahko označene z identifikacijsko številko ali nizom znakov, predvidenim v registracijskem sistemu, kot je recimo Digital Object Identifier System (DOI).

segment.source: An editorial/review board will be used by the journal.
The user access details for this journal have been updated.

Your journal is configured to record more than one usage metric. Usage statistics will be displayed in several contexts. There are cases where a single usage statistic must be used, e.g. to display an ordered list of most-used articles or to rank search results. Please select one of the configured metrics as a default.
segment.target: Vaša OJS namestitev beleži več kot le eno metriko uporabe, ki so prikazane v različnih kontekstih. V nekaterih primerih mora biti uporabljena le ena metrika (npr. vrstni red najbolj branih člankov ali vrstni red iskalnih rezultatof. Prosimo izberite eno od konfiguriranih metrik kot privzeto.
Števec pristopov do prispevka (samo za avtorje)

segment.source: OJS calculates the following statistics for each journal. The "days to review" is calculated from date of submission (or designation of Review Version) to the initial Editor Decision, while the "days to publish" is measured for accepted submissions from its original uploading to its publication.
segment.target: OJS izračuna spodnje statisike za vsako leto revijo. Število dni do recenzije je povprečen čas od datuma oddaje prispevka (oziroma oddaje priloge za recenzijo) do prve uredniške odločitve. Število dni do objave se računa le za sprejete prispevke in je povprečen čas od oddaje rokopisa do njegove objave v reviji.

segment.source: Check items to be made available to readers in About the Journal.
segment.target: Izberite postavke, ki bodo na voljo bralcem na strani O reviji.

segment.source: Note: Percentages for peer reviewed submissions may not add up to 100%, as items resubmitted are either accepted, declined, or still in process.
segment.target: Opozorilo: Ni nujno, da se odstotki recenziranih prispevkov seštejejo v f100%, ker so ponovno oddani prispevki ali potrjeni ali zavrnjeni ali pa so še v procesu.

segment.source: Select the sections for calculating this journal's peer-reviewed statistics.
segment.target: Izberite rubrike za izračun recenzentske statistike revije.
Vpogledi v stran s povzetkom prispevka

segment.source: Article abstract page views and downloads
segment.target: Vpogledi v stran s povzetkom in prenos datotek prispevka

segment.source: Issue table of contents page views
Narrow results by context (issues and/or article).
segment.target: Zožaj območje rezultato z izbiro konteksta (številke in/ali prispevki).

segment.source: Narrow results by object type (journal, issue, article, file types) and/or by one or more object id(s).
segment.target: Zožaj območje rezultato z izbiro tipa objekta (revija, številka, prispevek, tip datoteke) in/ali eno ali več IDjev objekta/ov.

segment.source: Upon subscription expiry, readers may be denied access to all subscription content or may continue to retain access to subscription content published prior to the subscription expiry date.
segment.target: Po izteku naročnine je bralcem lahko zavrnjen dostop do vseh naročenih vsebin ali pa ohranijo dostop do vsebin, ki so mu bile na voljo pred iztekom naročnine.

segment.source: Readers are denied access to all subscription content upon subscription expiry.
segment.target: Bralcem je zavrnjen dostop do vseh vsebin po izteku naročnine.

segment.source: Readers are denied access to recently published subscription content, but retain access to subscription content published prior to the subscription expiry date.
segment.target: Bralcem je zavrnjen dostop do vsebin, ki izidejo po datumu izteka naročnine, obdržijo pa dostop do vsebin, ki so bile objavljene pred iztekom naročnine.

segment.source: Notify subscribers by email after subscription expiry
segment.target: Pošlji email obvestilo naročniku, ko poteče naročnina.

segment.source: Notify subscribers by email after subscription expiry.
segment.target: Pošlji email obvestilo naročniku, ko poteče naročnina.

segment.source: Notify subscribers by email before subscription expiry.
segment.target: Pošlji email obvestilo naročniku pred potekom naročnine.

segment.source: Notify subscribers by email before subscription expiry.
segment.target: Pošlji email obvestilo naročniku pred potekom naročnine.

segment.source: Automated email reminders (available for editing by Journal Managers in OJS's Emails) can be sent to subscribers both before and after a subscription has expired.
segment.target: Naročnikom se lahko avtomatsko pošlje e-poštne opomnike pred in po izteku naročnine. Predloge e-pošte urejajo glavni uredniki revije v OJS e-poštnih predlogah.

segment.source: Note: To activate these options, the site administrator must enable the scheduled_tasks option in the OJS configuration file. Additional server configuration may be required to support this functionality (which may not be possible on all servers), as indicated in the OJS documentation.
segment.target: Opozorilo: a aktivacijo teh opcij mora administrator spletišča aktivirati nastavitev scheduled_tasks v nastavitveni datoteki OJS. Morda bodo potrebne tudi dodatne nastavitve strežnika, da bo ta opcija podprta kot je opisano v OJS dokumentaciji

segment.source: HTML can be used in textarea (for font size, color, etc.), with "returns" treated as <tt><br></tt>; HTML editor works with Firefox browsers.
segment.target: Dovoljena je uporaba HTML-ja v besedilnih poljih (za pisavo, velikost, barvo itd), s tem, da se tipka "enter" obravnava kot <tt><br></tt>; HTML urejevalnik deluje v brskalniku Firefox.

segment.source: Please select a valid value for the number of months after subscription expiry.
segment.target: Prosimo izberite veljavno vrednost za število mesecev po izteku naročnine.

segment.source: Please select a valid value for the number of months before subscription expiry.
segment.target: Prosimo izberite veljavno vrednost za število mesecev pred iztekom naročnine.

segment.source: Please select a valid value for the number of weeks after subscription expiry.
segment.target: Prosimo izberite veljavno vrednost za število tednov po izteku naročnine.

segment.source: Please select a valid value for the number of weeks before subscription expiry.
segment.target: Prosimo izberite veljavno vrednost za število tednov pred iztekom naročnine.

segment.source: Registered readers will have the option of receiving the table of contents by email when an issue becomes open access.
segment.target: Registrirani uporabniki bodo imeli možnost prejemanja e-poštnih obvestil s kazalom vsebine, ko bo revija imela odprt dostop do vsebine.

segment.source: Note: To activate this option, the site administrator must enable the scheduled_tasks option in the OJS configuration file. Additional server configuration may be required to support this functionality (which may not be possible on all servers), as indicated in the OJS documentation.
segment.target: Opozorilo: Za aktivacijo teh opcij mora administrator spletišča aktivirati nastavitev scheduled_tasks v nastavitveni datoteki OJS. Morda bodo potrebne tudi dodatne nastavitve strežnika, da bo ta opcija podprta kot je opisano v OJS dokumentaciji.

segment.source: Automated email notifications (available for editing by Journal Managers in OJS's Emails) can be sent to the Subscription Manager upon the completion of subscription online payments.
segment.target: Po končanem plačilu naročnine preko spleta, se lahko pošlje avtomatsko e-poštno obvestilo upravitelju naročnin (ki ga lahko urejajo upravitelj revije med OJS predpripravljenimi e-poštami).

segment.source: Notify Subscription Manager by email upon online purchase of an Individual subscription.
segment.target: Obvesti upravitelja naročnin preko e-pošte o nakupu individualne naročnine preko spleta.

segment.source: Notify Subscription Manager by email upon online purchase of an Institutional subscription (recommended).
segment.target: Obvesti upravitelja naročnin preko e-pošte o nakupu institucionalne naročnine preko spleta (priporočljivo).

segment.source: Notify Subscription Manager by email upon online renewal of an Individual subscription.
segment.target: Obvesti upravitelja naročnin preko e-pošte o podaljšanju individualne naročnine preko spleta.

segment.source: Notify Subscription Manager by email upon online renewal of an Institutional subscription.
segment.target: Obvesti upravitelja naročnin preko e-pošte o podaljšanju institucionalne naročnine preko spleta.

segment.source: Note: Institutional subscriptions purchased online require approval of the provided domain and IP ranges and activation of the subscription by the Subscription Manager.
segment.target: Opozorilo: Nakup institucionalne naročnine preko spleta zahteva potrditev posredovane domena in IP območja in ročno aktivacijo naročnine, ki jo opravi upravitelj naročnin.

segment.source: Note: To enable these options, the Journal Manager must enable the online payments module, including online payments for subscriptions, under Reader Fees.
segment.target: Opozorilo: Za vklop teh možnosti, mora Upravitelj revije omogočiti modul za plačilo preko spleta in možnost plačila naročnine preko spleta pod Pristojbine bralcev.

segment.source: Open Access Options For Subscription Journals
segment.target: Možnosti prostega dostopa za revije, ki zahtevajo naročnino

segment.source: Subscription journals can provide "delayed open access" to their published content, as well as permit "author self-archiving" (both of which increase readership and citation of content).
segment.target: Revije, ki zahtevajo naročnino, imajo lahko prost dostop z zamikom do objavljenih vsebin ali dovoljenje za avtorjevo samo-arhiviranje (oboje povečuje branost in možnost citiranja vsebine).

segment.source: The Subscription Types and fee structure will be displayed on the subscriptions page, along with the name and contact information for the Subscription Manager. Additional information about subscriptions, such as methods of payment or support for subscribers in developing countries, can be added here.
segment.target: Tipi naročnine in struktura pristojbin bo napisana avtomatsko na strani O reviji, pod razdelkom Naročnine, skupaj z imenom in kontaktnimi informacijami upravitelja naročnin. Tukaj lahko dodate dodatne informacije o naročninah, kot so metode plačila ali podpora za naročnine iz nerazvitih držav.

segment.source: These contact details will be listed on the subscription page for customers with enquiries related to subscriptions.
segment.target: Kontakt napisan pod rubriko Naročnine na strani O reviji

segment.source: Are you sure you want to renew this subscription?
segment.target: Ste prepričani, da želite obnoviti naročnino?

segment.source: Are you sure you want to delete this subscription?
segment.target: Ste prepričani, da želite zbrisati to naročnino?

segment.source: Please select a valid subscription status.
Please select a valid subscription type.
A subscription start date is required.
Please select a valid subscription start date.
segment.target: Prosimo izberite veljaven datum začetka naročnine.

segment.source: A subscription end date is required.
This is a non-expiring subscription type; please do not specify a start date.
segment.target: To je časovno neomejena naročnina; prosimo ne določite začetnega datuma.

segment.source: This is a non-expiring subscription type; please do not specify an end date.
segment.target: To je časovno neomejena naročnina; prosimo ne določite končnega datuma.

segment.source: Please select a valid subscription end date.
segment.target: Prosimo izberite veljaven datum prenehanja naročnine.

segment.source: Note: All changes below are to user's system-wide profile.
segment.target: Opozorilo: Vse spodnje spremembe se nanašajo na uporabnikov račun v celotnem sistemu.

segment.source: Send the user an email with their username and subscription details.
segment.target: Pošlji uporabniku e-pošto z njegovim uporabniškim imenom in podrobnostmi naročnine.

segment.source: Enter membership information if the subscription type requires that subscribers belong to an association or organization.
segment.target: Vpišite članske podatke, če ta tip naročnine zahteva, da je naročnik član združenja ali organizacije.

segment.source: The selected subscription type requires membership information.
segment.target: Izbran tip naročnine zahteva članske podatke.

segment.source:
If a domain is entered here, IP ranges are optional.
Valid values are domain names (e.g. lib.sfu.ca).
segment.target:
Če je tu vpisana domena, je IP območje neobvezno.
Veljavne vrednosti so imena domen (npr. lib.sfu.ca).

segment.source: The selected subscription type requires a domain and/or an IP range for subscription authentication.
segment.target: Izbran tip naročnine zahteva ime domene in/ali IP območje za avtentikacijo naročnine.

segment.source:
If IP ranges are entered here, the domain is optional.
Valid values include an IP address (e.g. 142.58.103.1), IP range (e.g. 142.58.103.1 - 142.58.103.4), IP range with wildcard '*' (e.g. 142.58.*.*), and an IP range with CIDR (e.g. 142.58.100.0/24).
segment.target:
Če je tukaj vpisano IP območje, je ime domene neobvezno.
Veljavne vrednosti so IP naslov (npr. 142.58.103.1), IP območje (npr. 142.58.103.1 - 142.58.103.4), IP območje z nadomestnim znakom '*' (npr. 142.58.*.*) in IP območje s CIDR (npr. 142.58.100.0/24).

segment.source: Please enter a valid IP range.
In order to send the user a notification email, the subscription contact name and email address must be specified in the journal Setup.
segment.target: Če želite poslati uporabniku e-pošto z obvestilom, mora imeti naročniški kontakt v nastavitvah revije specificirano ime in e-poštni naslov.

segment.source: This user already has a subscription for this journal.
segment.target: Ta uporabnik ima že veljavno naročnino za to revijo.

segment.source: A subscription type must be created before new subscriptions can be made.
segment.target: Pred novo naročnino mora biti ustvarjen nov tip naročnine.

segment.source: Subscription access privileges are automatically granted to the journal's Journal Managers, Editors, Section Editors, Layout Editors, Copyeditors, and Proofreaders.
segment.target: Glavni urednik revije, uredniki, uredniki rubrik, grafični uredniki, lektorji in korektorji imajo avtomatsko dodeljene naročniške pravice.

segment.source: Warning! All subscriptions with this subscription type will also be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue and delete this subscription type?
segment.target: Opozorilo! Zbrisane bodo tudi vse naročnine tega tipa. Ste prepričani, da želite zbrisati ta tip naročnine?

segment.source: Enter a numeric value (e.g. 40 or 40.00) without symbol (e.g., $).
segment.target: Vnestie le numerično vrednost (npr. 40 ali 40.00), brez enote za valuto (npr. $).

segment.source: The cost must be a positive, numeric value.

segment.target: Prosimo izberite eno od ponujenih možnosti.

segment.source: The number of months the subscription lasts (e.g. 12).
The duration must be a positive, numeric value.
A subscription type format is required.
Please select a valid subscription type format.
segment.target: Prosimo izberite veljaven format tipa naročnine.

segment.source: Institutional (users are validated via domain or IP address)
segment.target: Institucionalna (uporabniki se validirajo preko domene ali IP naslova)

segment.source: Subscriptions require membership information (e.g. of an association, organization, consortium, etc.)
segment.target: Naročnine zahtevajo podatke o članstvu (npr. združenje, organizacija, itd.)

segment.source: Do not make this subscription type publicly available or visible on the website.
segment.target: Ta vrsta naročnine naj ne bo vidna javno (npr. pod Naročnine na strani O reviji).

segment.source: A subscription type with this name already exists.
segment.target: Tip naročnine s tem imenom že obstaja.

segment.source: A subscription type name is required.
No subscription types have been created.
segment.target: Nobenega tipa naročnine ni bilo ustvarjenega.
Tip naročnine je bil uspešno ustvarjen.

segment.source: Link to a page describing the subscriptions you offer.
segment.target: Povezava do strani, kjer imate opis naročnin, ki jih omogočate.

segment.source: Link to a page describing the visitor's current and past subscriptions.
segment.target: Povezava do strani, kjer so opisane vse naročnine uporabnika, sedanja in pretekle.

segment.source: This link will only be displayed when a visitor is logged in.
segment.target: Povezava bo prikazana le, ko bo uporabnik prijavljen.

segment.source: Choose the most appropriate categories from the set listed above. Readers will be able to browse by category from the complete journal set.
segment.target: Izberite najbolj primerne kategorije izmed možnosti naštetih zgoraj. Bralci bodo lahko pregledovali revije po kategorijah.

segment.source: Articles within published issues of a journal are organized in Sections, typically by theme or content type (e.g. Review Articles, Research, etc).
segment.target: Articles within published issues of a journal are organized in Sections, typically by theme or content type (e.g. Review Articles, Research, etc).

segment.source: Roles are groups of users in the journal who are given access to different permission levels and associated workflows within the journal. There are five different permission levels: Journal Managers have access to everything in the journal (all content and settings); Section Editors have complete access to all assigned content; Journal Assistants have limited access to all submissions that have been explicitly assigned to them by an editor; Reviewers can see and perform the submissions they have been assigned to review; and Authors can see and interact with a limited amount of information on their own submissions. Additionally, there are five different stage assignments that roles may be given access to: Submission, Internal Review, Review, Editorial, and Production.
segment.target: Roles are groups of users in the journal who are given access to different permission levels and associated workflows within the journal. There are five different permission levels: Journal Managers have access to everything in the journal (all content and settings); Section Editors have complete access to all assigned content; Journal Assistants have limited access to all submissions that have been explicitly assigned to them by an editor; Reviewers can see and perform the submissions they have been assigned to review; and Authors can see and interact with a limited amount of information on their own submissions. Additionally, there are five different stage assignments that roles may be given access to: Submission, Internal Review, Review, Editorial, and Production.

segment.source: Base new article's copyright year on
segment.target: Za leto avtorstva prispevka naj se uporabi

segment.source: Article: default year will be drawn from the article's publication date, as in "publish-as-you-go".
segment.target: Article: default year will be drawn from the article's publication date, as in "publish-as-you-go".

segment.source: Issue: default year will be drawn from the issue's publication date.
segment.target: Issue: default year will be drawn from the issue's publication date.

segment.source: Are you sure you wish to reset permissions data for all articles? This action can not be undone.
segment.target: Are you sure you wish to reset permissions data already attached to articles?

segment.source: Remove the copyright statement and license information for every published article, reverting them to the journal's current default settings. This will permanently remove all prior copyright and licensing information attached to articles. In some cases, you may not be legally permitted to re-license work that has been published under a different license. Please take caution when using this tool and consult legal expertise if you are unsure what rights you hold over the articles published in your journal.
segment.target: Izjava o avtorskih pravicah in licenci bo trajno zapisana poleg objavljenih vsebin, ter s tem zagotavljala, da se ti podatki ne bodo spreminjali v primeru, da revija spremeni politiko novih prispevkov. Za ponastavitev shranjenih dovoljenj, ki so že zapisane poleg objavljenih vsebin, uporabite spodnji gumb.

segment.source: These components are used for file-naming purposes and are presented in a pull-down menu on uploading files. The genres designated ## allow the user to associate the file with either the whole submission 99Z or a particular component by number (e.g., 02).
segment.target: Te komponente se uporabljajo za poimenovanje datotek in so prikazane kot spustni meni pri nalaganju datotek. Oštevilčenje omogoča, da uporabnik poveže datoteko ali s celotnim prispevkom ali le določeno komponento prispevka.

segment.source: In order to use this plugin please go to the "Public Identifier" plugin category, enable and configure the DOI plugin and specify a valid DOI prefix there.
segment.target: Za uporabo tega vtičnika morate omogočiti in nastaviti DOI vtičnik v kategoriji "Javni identivikatorji" in vnesti veljaven DOI prefix.

segment.source: The plugin is not fully set up.
No publishing objects are selected for DOI assignment in the DOI public identifier plugin, so there is no deposit or export possibility in this plugin.
segment.target: V vtičniku za DOI ni izbrana nobena entiteta za dodeljevanje DOI-ja, zato ni mogoč noben izvoz ali deponiranje v tem vtičniku.

segment.source: Please note that the password will be saved as plain text, i.e. not encrypted.
segment.target: Prosimo, da se zavedate, da bo geslo shranjeno v prostem besedilu, torej ne bo enkriptirano.

segment.source: Validate XML before the export and registration.
segment.target: Preveri XML datoteko pred izvozom in registracijo.
Izbranih objektov ni bilo mogoče pretvoriti.

segment.source: The output file {$param} is not writable.
segment.target: V izhodno datoteko {$param} ni mogoče pisati.

segment.source: The input file {$param} is not readable.
Registration was not successful! The DOI registration server returned an error: '{$param}'.
segment.target: Registracija ni bila uspešna! Registracijski strežnik za DOI je vrnil napako: '{$param}'.

segment.source: DOI prefix is missing for the journal with the path {$path}.
segment.target: Revija s potjo {$path} nima DOI prefiksa.

segment.source: The specified journal path, "{$journalPath}", does not exist.
The specified objects could not be found.
segment.target: Izbranih objektov ni bilo mogoče najti.

segment.source: Send a copy to the primary contact, identified in the Journal Settings.
segment.target: Pošlji kopijo glavnemu kontaktu revije, ki je določen v nastavitvah revije.

segment.source: No articles were found with usage statistics matching these parameters.
